summary: During a homecoming to his provincial home, a young man gets involved with a woman strangely haunted and ultimately possessed, by her sister's spirit, paving the way to revealing the painful truth about her unsolved disappearance.
cast: Tommy Abuel|Mario Montenegro|Mona Lisa|Charo Santos-Concio|Sarah K. Joaquin|Susan Valdez-LeGoff|Moody Diaz
title: Itim
